name: Epsilon3
headline: The OS for spacecraft and complex operations
description: Epsilon3 is the OS for spacecraft and complex operations. We are a growing team of engineers formerly from SpaceX, Google, and Stanford. Our team worked firsthand on over 100 launches, including training and coordinating operations for multiple astronauts who successfully traveled to space and back. We are taking everything we learned and building software to make testing and operations as efficient, error-free, and enjoyable as possible. Our first product is a web-based platform for managing and tracking test and operational procedures.
tags: industry:commercial-space-launch; industry:saas; industry:space-exploration; industry:b2b; industry:enterprise-software; location:los-angeles

founders.name: Laura Crabtree, Founder
founders.description: 15+ years satellite and spacecraft operations, lead trainer + CORE operator for SpaceX Demo-2 Astronauts. Leader, innovator & deeply passionate about space, exploration and the future of mankind.

founders.name: Max Mednik, Founder
founders.description: 4x entrepreneur, software engineer, and angel investor. Stanford and UCLA Anderson grad. Magician, scuba diver, and student of life.

generated_description:
Epsilon3 is an innovative company on a mission to create "The OS for spacecraft and complex operations." Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator Batch S21, Epsilon3 is located in Los Angeles, California. The company is made up of a talented team of 12 engineers, many of whom hail from prestigious backgrounds at SpaceX, Google, and Stanford. They bring with them invaluable experience from over 100 space launches and have participated in training astronauts for their missions.

The core product of Epsilon3 is a comprehensive web-based platform designed for managing and tracking test and operational procedures. This platform aims to streamline operations, minimize errors, and enhance the overall experience of complex tasks in the commercial space sector. The platform's capabilities extend beyond just aerospace; Epsilon3 is also applicable in industries such as aviation, automotive, medical procedures, and energy.

Epsilon3 provides a suite of tools that help organizations modernize their procedures, centralize information, and drive collaboration. The platform supports functions such as scheduling operations, managing assembly and inventory, executing workflows, conducting QA testing, analyzing data, and uncovering insights. Their approach integrates cutting-edge technology aimed at reducing time wastage and enhancing productivity in high-stakes environments.

Their customer base includes notable names like NASA, Rocket Lab, and Virgin Galactic, underscoring their credibility and the industry-wide trust in their solutions. As they continue to grow and refine their offerings, Epsilon3 is set to play a pivotal role in the future of space exploration and complex operational management.

For more information, you can check their website: [Epsilon3](https://www.epsilon3.io/).
